attributes.action: Reduce the age to apply for an Airsoft licence to 16 years of age, thus allowing for the purchase of realistic imitation firearms (BB or airsoft weaponry) to 16+ year olds, instead of 18.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to attempt to lower the age for one to purchase an airsoft replica, and to be able to play in airsoft skirmishes with one's own kit to the age of 16 instead of 18.
